incidents.title: Drie drones waargenomen boven kerncentrale Doel 3
incidents.description: Reported by VRT. Meerdere getuigen zagen drie drones boven kerncentrale Doel 3 vliegen. Energiespecialist bevestigt dat kernreactoren bestand zijn tegen vliegtuigimpacts. Geen operationele gevolgen, geen nucleair gevaar.

incidents.title: Terneuzen: 12-20 drones over North Sea Port + Dow Chemical
incidents.description: 12-20 drones observed over North Sea Port area and Dow chemical plant (no-fly zone). Operators unknown. Police investigating. Largest drone swarm ever observed at this location.
incidents.strategic_assessment: Critical infrastructure targeting - chemical plant + port. Part of broader pattern of drone incidentsover EU infrastructure (Belgium military bases, airports). Potential state-actor involvement given coordination and target selection.

incidents.title: Terneuzen: 12-20 drones over North Sea Port + Dow Chemical
